generated.css: *,:after,:before{margin:0;padding:0;box-sizing:border-box;-webkit-tap-highlight-color:transparent}html{font-size:62.5%}body{font-size:2rem;color:#444;font-family:Dosis,sans-serif;background-color:#ddd}::selection{background-color:#730101;color:#fff}::-moz-selection{background-color:#730101;color:#fff}.container{max-width:1440px;margin:0 auto}.grid-width{max-width:90%}h2,span,strong{color:#730101}.nav{box-shadow:0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,.3);display:flex;width:100%;justify-content:space-between;position:fixed;background-color:#ddd;padding:2rem 20%;z-index:1;transition:transform .3s}.nav li{list-style:none;overflow-x:hidden}.nav li a{text-decoration:none;color:inherit;font-family:Kanit,sans-serif;font-size:2.5rem;position:relative}.nav li a:before{top:0;left:-100%}.nav li a:after,.nav li a:before{content:"";width:100%;height:2px;position:absolute;background-color:currentColor;transition:all .3s}.nav li a:after{left:100%;bottom:0}.nav li a:hover:after,.nav li a:hover:before{left:0}.nav:after{content:"";position:absolute;width:100vw;height:1px;bottom:0;background-color:#ddd}.hero{max-width:90%;height:95vh;margin:0 auto}.hero__name{animation:fill .5s ease 3.5s forwards}.hero__about{left:50%;position:absolute;transform:translate(-50%,-50%);top:50%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:3rem;text-align:justify}.hero__about svg{width:80%;height:100%}.hero__about h2{font-family:Montserrat Subrayada,sans-serif;font-size:5rem;min-width:max-content;animation:drop-down .5s 2s forwards;opacity:0}.hero__about p{max-width:90rem;font-size:inherit;line-height:1.5;opacity:0;animation:display-text 2s 3s forwards}.hero__about p svg{height:1rem;margin-left:2rem}.hero__image{width:90%}.hero__image img{width:100%}.hero .down-arrow{padding:1rem;bottom:-10%;left:50%;transform:translateX(-50%);opacity:0;position:absolute;display:inline-block;animation:arrow 2s 4s infinite}.path:first-child{stroke-dasharray:876px;stroke-dashoffset:876px;animation:animate-name 2s ease 0s forwards}.path:nth-child(2){stroke-dasharray:314px;stroke-dashoffset:314px;animation:animate-name 2s ease .2s forwards}.path:nth-child(3){stroke-dasharray:295px;stroke-dashoffset:295px;animation:animate-name 2s ease .4s forwards}.path:nth-child(4){stroke-dasharray:265px;stroke-dashoffset:265px;animation:animate-name 2s ease .6s forwards}.path:nth-child(5){stroke-dasharray:277px;stroke-dashoffset:277px;animation:animate-name 2s ease .8s forwards}.path:nth-child(6){stroke-dasharray:623px;stroke-dashoffset:623px;animation:animate-name 2s ease 1s forwards}.path:nth-child(7){stroke-dasharray:193px;stroke-dashoffset:193px;animation:animate-name 2s ease 1.2s forwards}.path:nth-child(8){stroke-dasharray:166px;stroke-dashoffset:166px;animation:animate-name 2s ease 1.4s forwards}.path:nth-child(9){stroke-dasharray:193px;stroke-dashoffset:193px;animation:animate-name 2s ease 1.6s forwards}.path:nth-child(10){stroke-dasharray:270px;stroke-dashoffset:270px;animation:animate-name 2s ease 1.8s forwards}.path:nth-child(11){stroke-dasharray:162px;stroke-dashoffset:162px;animation:animate-name 2s ease 2s forwards}@keyframes animate-name{to{stroke-dashoffset:0}}@keyframes fill{0%{fill:transparent}to{fill:#444}}.work{display:flex;flex-direction:column;margin:5rem auto;gap:8rem}.work article{display:grid;place-items:center;grid-template-columns:repeat(2,1fr);max-width:80%;margin:0 auto;height:100vh}.work__text{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:2rem;width:90%;font-size:2rem}.work__text h3{font-family:Montserrat Subrayada,sans-serif;text-decoration:none;color:inherit;font-size:3rem}.work__text--description{font-family:Lato,sans-serif;font-weight:700;font-size:2rem}.work__image{width:90%}.work__image img{width:100%;max-width:800px;filter:drop-shadow(10px 10px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.5))}.work .how-it-works{display:flex;flex-direction:column;font-size:1.6rem;gap:2rem;letter-spacing:.5px}.work .try-it-live{margin-top:2rem;display:flex;justify-content:flex-start;gap:10rem;font-size:1.6rem}.work .try-it-live img{height:5rem;transition:all .2s}.work .try-it-live img:hover{animation:wiggle .3s ease-in-out 1 backwards;transform:translateY(-2px)}.work .try-it-live div{display:flex;flex-direction:column;align-items:center}.tools{text-align:center;font-size:1.6rem;margin:10rem auto;max-width:80%}.tools__heading{margin-bottom:10rem;font-size:2.5rem}.tools ul{margin:0 auto;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit,minmax(5rem,1fr));gap:3%}.tools ul li{max-width:13rem;list-style:none}.tools ul li:last-child{display:flex;align-items:center;font-style:italic}.tools__image{width:100%}.contact{font-size:1.6rem;margin:10rem auto;max-width:50rem;gap:2rem;border:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.3);padding:3rem;background-color:#eee;box-shadow:3px 3px 10px rgba(0,0,0,.3)}.contact,.contact div{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:space-between}.contact div{margin:0}.contact div label{transform:translateY(110%);transition:transform .3s;cursor:text;padding:0 .5rem}.contact div .input,.contact div textarea{width:100%;height:max-content;border:none;background-color:#fff;outline:none;cursor:text;font-size:1.6rem;padding:.5rem;font-family:Segoe UI,sans-serif}.contact div .input:focus,.contact div textarea:focus{outline:1px solid rgba(0,0,0,.3)}.contact div .input:not(:last-child){height:2.5rem}.contact div .submit{width:100%;font-family:inherit;text-transform:uppercase;padding:1rem 3rem}.contact div span{color:#730101}@media only screen and (max-width:1200px){.work .work__image{grid-column:1;grid-row:1}article{height:max-content!important;grid-template-columns:1fr!important;gap:3rem}article img{margin-bottom:3rem}}@media only screen and (max-width:820px){body{text-align:justify!important}.nav{font-size:1.5rem}.hero{font-size:1.2rem;max-width:90%}.hero h1{font-size:7rem}.hero h2{font-size:3rem}.work p{font-size:1.2rem}.work .work__text--description{font-size:1.6rem}.work .work__image{grid-column:1;grid-row:1}.work h3{font-size:2.6rem}article{height:max-content!important;grid-template-columns:1fr!important;gap:3rem}.contact{max-width:90%;gap:1rem}}@media only screen and (max-width:425px){.nav{padding:1rem 2rem}.nav a{font-size:1.2rem!important}.hero h1{font-size:5rem}.hero h2{font-size:2rem}.work .try-it-live{justify-content:space-between!important;gap:0}.work h3{font-size:2.2rem}.work__text--description{font-size:1.4rem!important}.contact{max-width:90%;gap:.5rem}}@keyframes wiggle{33%{rotate:5deg}66%{rotate:-5deg}to{rotate:0}}@keyframes come-in{0%{opacity:0}to{opacity:1}}@keyframes drop-down{0%{opacity:0;transform:translateY(-100%)}to{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0)}}@keyframes display-text{0%{opacity:0;transform:translateY(2rem)}to{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0)}}@keyframes arrow{0%{transform:translateY(0)}50%{opacity:1}to{transform:translateY(100%);opacity:0}}
